targets.query:
CarTelemetry
| union CarStatus, Lap, Participant, Session
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| count

Participant
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp 
| take 1
| project Name

Participant
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp | take 1
| extend DriverTeamId = TeamId
| join  kind=rightsemi Teams  on $left.DriverTeamId == $right.Id
| project Name

Participant
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp  | take 1
| join  kind=rightsemi Nationalities  on $left.Nationality == $right.Id
| project Name

Lap
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp, SessionTime 
| take 1
| project CurrentLapNum

Lap
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp, SessionTime 
| take 1
| project CarPosition

Lap
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp, SessionTime 
| take 1
| project CurrentLapTime

Lap
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp, SessionTime 
| take 1
| project LastLapTime

Lap
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp, SessionTime 
| take 1
| project BestLapTime

Lap
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp, SessionTime 
| take 1
| project DriverStatus

Lap
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp, SessionTime 
| take 1
| project LapDistance

Lap
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp, SessionTime 
| take 1
| project TotalDistance

Lap
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp, SessionTime 
| take 1
| project TimePenalties

Lap
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp, SessionTime 
| take 1
| project PitStatus

Lap
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp, SessionTime 
| take 1
| project GridPosition

Lap
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp, SessionTime 
| take 1
| project ResultStatus

Session
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp, SessionTime 
| take 1 
| project TotalLaps

Session
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1 
| project SessionTime

Session
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1 
| project Weather

Participant
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp 
| take 1
| project NumOfActiveCars

Session
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime  | take 1
| join  kind=rightsemi Tracks on $left.TrackId == $right.Id
| project Name

Session
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1 
| project SessionDuration

Session
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1 
| project SessionTimeLeft

Session
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 10 
| project AirTemp

Session
| where  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 10 
| project TrackTemp

CarTelemetry
| where VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex and $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1 
| project Speed

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1 
| project EngineRPM

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 100 
| project Gear

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1 
| project ABS

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1 
| project TractionControl

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 100
| project FuelInTank

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1 
| project FuelCapacity

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 100 
| project FuelRemainingLaps

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1 
| project DRSAllowed

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1 
| project VehicleFIAFlags

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1
| project EngineDamage , GearBoxDamage ,FLWingDamage , FRWingDamage , RearWingDamage

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project Gear , Timestamp

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project Clutch  , Timestamp

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project Steering , Timestamp

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project Timestamp, Brake

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project Timestamp, Throttle

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project Speed , Timestamp

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project EngineTemp  , Timestamp

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1
| project TyreVisualCompound

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1
| project FLTyreWear, FRTyreWear, RLTyreWear , RRTyreWear

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 1
| project FLTyreDamage , FRTyreDamage , RLTyreDamage  , RRTyreDamage

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project FLTyrePressure,Timestamp

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project FRTyrePressure, Timestamp

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project RLTyrePressure, Timestamp

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project RRTyrePressure, Timestamp

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project FLTyreSurfaceTemp, Timestamp

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project FRTyreSurfaceTemp,Timestamp

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project RLTyreSurfaceTemp,Timestamp

CarTelemetry
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project RRTyreSurfaceTemp,Timestamp

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project Timestamp, FLTyreWear

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project Timestamp  , FRTyreWear

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project Timestamp  , RLTyreWear

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project Timestamp  , RRTyreWear

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project Timestamp, FLTyreDamage

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project Timestamp,FRTyreDamage

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| project Timestamp,RLTyreDamage

CarStatus
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and VehicleIndex == PlayerCarIndex 
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime  
| project Timestamp,RRTyreDamage

let participant = Participant
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 20
| project Name, VehicleIndex;
Lap
| where $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
| order by Timestamp , SessionTime 
| take 20
| join  kind=rightouter  participant on VehicleIndex
| order by CarPosition asc
| project CarPosition, Name, CurrentLapNum, GridPosition, CurrentLapTime, LastLapTime
